'''Radiant Spincrystal 83''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Arid Canyon]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in [[Land of Upper Setekh]], at the entrance to the [[Valley of Dahri]] where you meet [[Afratu]].
